channel.title: MYB

item.title: Samsung Slashes Galaxy Z Flip 6 Price In New Sale
item.description: Samsung has responded to the iPhone 16e launch with a major new sale.

item.title: ‘Monster Hunter Wilds’ Proves Steam Deck Verification Is Meaningless
item.description: When it comes to enjoying a game on Steam Deck, my opinion doesn't matter. Neither does Valve's "Deck Verified" program.
